title: Otorehinaiti River
text: The Otorehinaiti River is a river of the northwestern <a href="Hawke%27s%20Bay%20region">Hawke's Bay region</a> of <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>'s <a href="North%20Island">North Island</a>. It flows northwest from the <a href="Kaweka%20Forest%20Park">Kaweka Forest Park</a> to reach the <a href="Mohaka%20River">Mohaka River</a>.
